thread.title: Apple boss hopeful on Chinas economy
thread.title_full: Apple boss hopeful on Chinas economy

title: Apple boss hopeful on Chinas economy
text:
Apple boss hopeful on China's economy 
Sky News Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
US technology giant Apple will continue to invest in China despite slowing growth in the world's second-largest economy, chief executive Tim Cook said.Cook was speaking to state media as the company prepares to open its newest store in the mainland."I know some people are worried about the economy. We'll continue to invest," Cook told the official Xinhua news agency, according to a report late Wednesday."China is a superb place to be. Nothing has changed that," Cook said while on a visit to the country.China's economy logged its worst performance since the global financial crisis in the third ...
